titles.title: HP823 Ye choirs of new Jerusalem

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ye choirs of new Jerusalem,
Your sweetest notes employ,
The paschal victory to hymn
In strains of holy joy.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For Judah's lion burst his chains,
And crushed the serpent's head;
And brought with him from death's domains
The long-imprisoned dead.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
From hell's devouring jaws the prey
Alone our leader bore;
His ransomed hosts pursue their way
Where he has gone before.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Triumphant in his glory now,
To him all power is given;
To him in one communion bow
All saints in earth and heaven.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
While joyful thus his praise we sing,
His mercy we implore,
Into his palace bright to bring
And keep us evermore.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
All glory to the Father be,
All glory to the Son,
All glory, Holy Ghost, to thee,
While endless ages run.
